brazilian-hammock.Name: Cotton Brazilian Hammock
brazilian-hammock.Body:
A beautifully traditional hammock, they are woven from luxuriously thick 100% pure cotton, making them strong and hard-wearing, yet natural and soft to lie in.

Our Brazilian style hammocks are eye-catchingly beautiful but also practical and comfortable. A fantastic hammock that is easy to use, feels gorgeous and is super stylish.

This generous size has enough room to comfortably fit any adult for an afternoon nap. You can lie on it with a (small) friend too but you'll be cosy. Great for a couple of children though.

They are suitable for indoors or outside and can be hung on trees, posts, wall hooks, frames or even children's garden equipment, the list is endless... They are machine washable (with a bit of preparation).

Type: Standard
Capacity: 130 kg
Bed Size: 125 cm (w) x 200 cm (l)
Weight: 1.3kg
Space (approx): 120-160 cm (h) x 300-380 cm (l)
Includes cotton carry bag (35 x 22 x 8 cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

brazilian-hammock.Name: Large Cotton Brazilian Hammock
brazilian-hammock.Body:
A beautifully traditional hammock, they are woven from luxuriously thick 100% pure cotton, making them strong and hard-wearing, yet natural and soft to lie in.

Our Brazilian style hammocks are eye-catchingly beautiful but also practical and comfortable. A fantastic hammock that is easy to use, feels gorgeous and is super stylish.

This large size is perfect for two (or maybe 3) adults but it's not too big if you want to lie alone. It's also nice to sit across it and use it like a sofa. A great place to snuggle with loved ones.

They are suitable for indoors or outside and can be hung on trees, posts, wall hooks, frames or even children's garden equipment, the list is endless... They are machine washable (with a bit of preparation).

Type: Large
Capacity: 180 kg
Bed Size: 165cm (w) x 200cm (l)
Weight: 1.7 kg
Space (approx): 140-175 cm (h) x 310-400 cm (l)
Includes cotton carry bag (40 x 25 x 10 cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

chair-hammock-frame.Name: Chair Hammock Frame
chair-hammock-frame.Body:
A free-standing frame for hanging hammock chairs. Adjustable in height, it is suitable for use indoors and out with most hanging type chairs. This frame is easy to assemble without tools and can be dismantled for storage. It can also be left outside as it is made from coated steel.

Capacity: 150 kg
Size: 200-240 (h) x 145 (l) x 120 (w)
Weight: 19 kg
Box: 120 x 11 x 56 cm
Suitability: Indoors or outdoors

FREE mainland UK NEXT DAY DELIVERY (usually dispatched same day). No returns.

frontpage.Name: Mexican Hammock
frontpage.Body:
These Mexican style hammocks are made from hundreds of cotton strings that are woven together to give you a soft bed that feels as though you are floating on air.

Despite their delicate appearance, a Mayan type hammock like this is extremely stretchy and strong - this size is a technically a single size but it will fit two adults and it is wide enough to lie totally across it (instead of lengthways). With a little bit of care, they should last for years of happy swinging.

A Mexican hammock is a stunning addition to any home, indoors or in the garden. It can be hung on trees, posts, pergolas, hooks in the walls and stands, to name but a few...

Capacity: 200kg
Size: 190cm (w) x 200cm (l)
Weight: 1kg
Space (approx): 140-200cm (h) x 300-400cm (l)
Includes cotton carry bag (18x22x12cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

frontpage.Name: Hanging Chair Hammock with Footrest
frontpage.Body:
These beautiful hammock chairs are extremely comfortable to relax in and with the addition of our unique, matching footrests, you can really stretch out.

Made from 100% natural cotton, these stylish hammock chairs include a wooden bar to spread them out, with a single fixing loop, so they hang from one point. They make a unique, space-saving luxury lounger.

You can easily hang them indoors using a ceiling hook - once you have located a ceiling joist (which may be covered over), it's easy to screw in the hook.  Outside in the garden, a tree, pergola, stand or even children's play equipment works perfectly. Chair hammocks are also ideal for small balconies too.

Capacity: 120kg
Size: 120cm (w) x 140cm (l)
Weight: 2.3kg
Space (approx): 240cm (h)
Includes cotton carry bag (100x10x10cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

frontpage.Name: Hanging Chair Hammock with Footrest
frontpage.Body:
These beautiful hammock chairs are extremely comfortable to relax in and with the addition of our unique, matching footrests, you can really stretch out.

hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Name: Basic Wall Hook
hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Body:
An easy hammock hook that is suitable for use in wood or masonry. Just drill in some screws and hang your hammock on an indoor or outdoor wall. It requires 4 x 6M, 6mm screws and raw plugs (where necessary) - not included.

Capacity: 120 kg

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

.

hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Name: Chair Hammock Hanging Kit
hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Body:
This hanging system lets you hang a chair hammock to any free-standing support such as a tree, pergola or climbing frame. Simple and easy to use — with no knots to tie. You can literally hang your chair hammock in seconds!

Each pack contains 1 rope, 1 hook and instructions.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Name: Ceiling Hook
hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Body:
Ceiling hooks are best for use in wood so they are especially suitable for hanging chair hammocks indoors from the ceiling*. They can also be used in 'partition' walls (where there is a wooden frame supporting the wall). They can be used in concrete or masonry but then they require a 16mm drill bit.

Each pack contains one screw, fixing instructions and an optional raw plug (for use in masonry or concrete). These are genuine Amazonas Jumbo hooks.

Capacity: 120 kg.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

*nb. When hanging a chair hammock using a ceiling hook, always use a  small piece of rope between the hammock and the chair to allow the chair to rotate freely without unscrewing the ceiling hook.

Please check your hammock fittings regularly as the motion of the hammock can cause loosening of the screws over time.

hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Name: Wall Hook
hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Body:
With these specially designed hammock hooks you can hang your hammock from most types of walls, both indoors and outside. Suitable for all types of walls (except 'partition' walls) and concrete ceilings. Easy to use and contains full instructions.

These are genuine Amazonas Easy Plus hooks.

Each Pack contains one hook, 4 screws (with raw plugs) and fixing instructions.

Capacity: 200kg.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Name: Hammock Hanging Kit
hammock-hooks-and-hanging-kits.Body:
This is our revolutionary hammock hanging system. It allows you to hang any kind of hammock to any free-standing support such as a tree, post or balcony railing. You can also use it to attach to any of our hammock hanging hooks. Simple and easy to use — with no knots to tie. You can literally hang your hammock in seconds!

Each pack contains 2 ropes, 2 hooks and instructions.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammock-stands.Name: Hammock Post CURRENTLY OUT OF STOCK
hammock-stands.Body:
Our single end hammock post is a free-standing A Frame support to hang one end of a hammock. Perfect if you have one good support for your hammock and need somewhere for the other end. Just peg it into the ground with the peg provided.

Made from treated Ash wood, it is only suitable for outdoor use. Assemble it in seconds using the guy ropes and pegs provided. It folds for carrying (weighs 4kg) so is great for camping. It is suitable for all Well Hung Hammocks, and almost any other type of hammock. 

Genuine Amazonas Madera frame

Capacity: 100kg
Size 165 cm (h)
Weight: 4kg
Box: 92 x 23 x 30 cm
Suitability: for use on soft ground only

FREE mainland UK DELIVERY (2-3 business days)

hammock-stands.Name: Metal Hammock Frame
hammock-stands.Body:
These hammock stands will fit all of our hammocks (except hanging chairs) as they are adjustable. They can be used on any flat surface, indoors or outside and can easily dismantled. 

They take a lot of weight so you can use them with 2 people.

They are made from powder-coated metal so they are suitable for long-term use outdoors. You can assemble them in a few minutes and do not need any tools. They are packed in a small box so are easy to store when not in use.

Genuine Amazonas Sumo Grande frame.

Capacity: 200kg
Size: 132cm (h) x 107cm (w) x 320-380cm (l)
Weight: 19kg
Box: 114 x 16 x 34 cm
Suitability: indoor and outdoor use

FREE NEXT DAY mainland UK DELIVERY (usually dispatched same day)

hammock-stands.Name: Wooden Hammock Frame
hammock-stands.Body:
This luxury wooden hammock frame adds a touch of class to any space. It is extremely elegant, sturdy and durable. Made from treated, weatherproof wood, it is  a very solid, high-quality stand that adjusts to fit various hammocks. It is suitable for all of our hammocks (except hanging chairs). It can be dismantled easily for transportation and storage.

Genuine Amazonas Olymp frame.

Capacity: 200 kg
Size: 397 (l) x 143 (h) x 145 (w)
Weight: 25 kg
Box: 203 x 16 x 45 cm
Suitability: Indoors or outdoor

FREE UK DELIVERY

hammocks.Body:

Our Brazilian style hammocks are eye-catchingly beautiful but also practical and comfortable. A fantastic hammock that is easy to use, feels gorgeous and is super stylish.

This large size is perfect for two (or maybe 3) adults but it's not too big if you want to lie alone. It's also nice to sit across it and use it like a sofa. A great place to snuggle with loved ones.

They are suitable for indoors or outside and can be hung on trees, posts, wall hooks, frames or even children's garden equipment, the list is endless... They are machine washable (with a bit of preparation).

Type: Large
Capacity: 180 kg
Bed Size: 165cm (w) x 200cm (l)
Weight: 1.7 kg
Space (approx): 140-175 cm (h) x 310-400 cm (l)
Includes cotton carry bag (40 x 25 x 10 cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammocks.Body:

These Mexican style hammocks are made from hundreds of cotton strings that are woven together to give you a soft bed that feels as though you are floating on air.

Despite their delicate appearance, a Mayan type hammock like this is extremely stretchy and strong. This size is very large and will comfortably fit three adults - it is actually our largest hammock. With a little bit of care, they should last for years of happy swinging.

A Mexican hammock is a stunning addition to any home, indoors or in the garden. It can be hung on trees, posts, pergolas, hooks in the walls and stands, to name but a few...

Size: 300cm (w) x 210cm (l)
Weight: 1.5kg

Includes cotton carry bag (20x30x15cm)

hammocks.Name: Hanging Chair Hammock with Footrest
hammocks.Body:
These beautiful hammock chairs are extremely comfortable to relax in and with the addition of our unique, matching footrests, you can really stretch out.

Made from 100% natural cotton, these stylish hammock chairs include a wooden bar to spread them out, with a single fixing loop, so they hang from one point. They make a unique, space-saving luxury lounger.

You can easily hang them indoors using a ceiling hook - once you have located a ceiling joist (which may be covered over), it's easy to screw in the hook.  Outside in the garden, a tree, pergola, stand or even children's play equipment works perfectly. Chair hammocks are also ideal for small balconies too.

Capacity: 120kg
Size: 120cm (w) x 140cm (l)
Weight: 2.3kg
Space (approx): 240cm (h)
Includes cotton carry bag (100x10x10cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammocks.Name: Hanging Chair Hammock with Footrest
hammocks.Body:
These beautiful hammock chairs are extremely comfortable to relax in and with the addition of our unique, matching footrests, you can really stretch out.

Made from 100% natural cotton, these stylish hammock chairs include a wooden bar to spread them out, with a single fixing loop, so they hang from one point. They make a unique, space-saving luxury lounger.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hammocks.Body:

hanging-accessories.Name: Basic Wall Hook
hanging-accessories.Body:
An easy hammock hook that is suitable for use in wood or masonry. Just drill in some screws and hang your hammock on an indoor or outdoor wall. It requires 4 x 6M, 6mm screws and raw plugs (where necessary) - not included.

Capacity: 120 kg

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

.

hanging-accessories.Name: Chair Hammock Hanging Kit
hanging-accessories.Body:
This hanging system lets you hang a chair hammock to any free-standing support such as a tree, pergola or climbing frame. Simple and easy to use — with no knots to tie. You can literally hang your chair hammock in seconds!

Each pack contains 1 rope, 1 hook and instructions.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hanging-accessories.Name: Ceiling Hook
hanging-accessories.Body:
Ceiling hooks are best for use in wood so they are especially suitable for hanging chair hammocks indoors from the ceiling*. They can also be used in 'partition' walls (where there is a wooden frame supporting the wall). They can be used in concrete or masonry but then they require a 16mm drill bit.

Each pack contains one screw, fixing instructions and an optional raw plug (for use in masonry or concrete). These are genuine Amazonas Jumbo hooks.

Capacity: 120 kg.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

*nb. When hanging a chair hammock using a ceiling hook, always use a  small piece of rope between the hammock and the chair to allow the chair to rotate freely without unscrewing the ceiling hook.

Please check your hammock fittings regularly as the motion of the hammock can cause loosening of the screws over time.

hanging-accessories.Name: Wall Hook
hanging-accessories.Body:
With these specially designed hammock hooks you can hang your hammock from most types of walls, both indoors and outside. Suitable for all types of walls (except 'partition' walls) and concrete ceilings. Easy to use and contains full instructions.

These are genuine Amazonas Easy Plus hooks.

Each Pack contains one hook, 4 screws (with raw plugs) and fixing instructions.

Capacity: 200kg.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hanging-accessories.Name: Hammock Hanging Kit
hanging-accessories.Body:
This is our revolutionary hammock hanging system. It allows you to hang any kind of hammock to any free-standing support such as a tree, post or balcony railing. You can also use it to attach to any of our hammock hanging hooks. Simple and easy to use — with no knots to tie. You can literally hang your hammock in seconds!

Each pack contains 2 ropes, 2 hooks and instructions.

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)

hanging-accessories.Name: Hammock Post CURRENTLY OUT OF STOCK
hanging-accessories.Body:
Our single end hammock post is a free-standing A Frame support to hang one end of a hammock. Perfect if you have one good support for your hammock and need somewhere for the other end. Just peg it into the ground with the peg provided.

Made from treated Ash wood, it is only suitable for outdoor use. Assemble it in seconds using the guy ropes and pegs provided. It folds for carrying (weighs 4kg) so is great for camping. It is suitable for all Well Hung Hammocks, and almost any other type of hammock. 

Genuine Amazonas Madera frame

Capacity: 100kg
Size 165 cm (h)
Weight: 4kg
Box: 92 x 23 x 30 cm
Suitability: for use on soft ground only

FREE mainland UK DELIVERY (2-3 business days)

hanging-accessories.Name: Chair Hammock Frame
hanging-accessories.Body:
A free-standing frame for hanging hammock chairs. Adjustable in height, it is suitable for use indoors and out with most hanging type chairs. This frame is easy to assemble without tools and can be dismantled for storage. It can also be left outside as it is made from coated steel.

Capacity: 150 kg
Size: 200-240 (h) x 145 (l) x 120 (w)
Weight: 19 kg
Box: 120 x 11 x 56 cm
Suitability: Indoors or outdoors

FREE mainland UK NEXT DAY DELIVERY (usually dispatched same day). No returns.

hanging-accessories.Name: Metal Hammock Frame
hanging-accessories.Body:
These hammock stands will fit all of our hammocks (except hanging chairs) as they are adjustable. They can be used on any flat surface, indoors or outside and can easily dismantled. 

They take a lot of weight so you can use them with 2 people.

They are made from powder-coated metal so they are suitable for long-term use outdoors. You can assemble them in a few minutes and do not need any tools. They are packed in a small box so are easy to store when not in use.

Genuine Amazonas Sumo Grande frame.

Capacity: 200kg
Size: 132cm (h) x 107cm (w) x 320-380cm (l)
Weight: 19kg
Box: 114 x 16 x 34 cm
Suitability: indoor and outdoor use

FREE NEXT DAY mainland UK DELIVERY (usually dispatched same day)

hanging-accessories.Name: Wooden Hammock Frame
hanging-accessories.Body:
This luxury wooden hammock frame adds a touch of class to any space. It is extremely elegant, sturdy and durable. Made from treated, weatherproof wood, it is  a very solid, high-quality stand that adjusts to fit various hammocks. It is suitable for all of our hammocks (except hanging chairs). It can be dismantled easily for transportation and storage.

Genuine Amazonas Olymp frame.

Capacity: 200 kg
Size: 397 (l) x 143 (h) x 145 (w)
Weight: 25 kg
Box: 203 x 16 x 45 cm
Suitability: Indoors or outdoor

FREE UK DELIVERY

mexican-hammock.Name: Mexican Hammock
mexican-hammock.Body:
These Mexican style hammocks are made from hundreds of cotton strings that are woven together to give you a soft bed that feels as though you are floating on air.

Despite their delicate appearance, a Mayan type hammock like this is extremely stretchy and strong - this size is a technically a single size but it will fit two adults and it is wide enough to lie totally across it (instead of lengthways). With a little bit of care, they should last for years of happy swinging.

A Mexican hammock is a stunning addition to any home, indoors or in the garden. It can be hung on trees, posts, pergolas, hooks in the walls and stands, to name but a few...

Capacity: 200kg
Size: 190cm (w) x 200cm (l)
Weight: 1kg
Space (approx): 140-200cm (h) x 300-400cm (l)
Includes cotton carry bag (18x22x12cm)

FREE UK SHIPPING (2-3 business days)
